title: Automated, Point-of-Care mobile flow cytometry: Bringing the laboratory to the sample
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): B.N. Jukema, T.C. Pelgrim, M. Spoelder, C.C.W.G. Bongers, M.T.E. Hopman, K. Smit, M.H. Rijk, R.P. Venekamp, N. Vrisekoop, L. Koenderman
